segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing; the water is just pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible how she hasn't noticed the puddle forming around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite sneaky, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the stool hasn't tipped over yet, with how unsteady it looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly waiting for her share, completely focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they've been at it and how many cookies they've already taken.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how such a mundane scene can be filled with so much tension and excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and catches them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR
